title: Birthday Wishes Granted
content:
Not to Veer too far off the beaten path:-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/granted_4345.jpg)

ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content: Happy B -Day General! :-D
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/happy-birthday-grant-from-d_5574.jpg)

LOL!!!

Good one Danno!

ChrisL
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/march_3542.jpg)

Way to keep in step Chuck :-)

ChrisL
you two were having fun, so I decided to take a shot...

Missouri Volunteers aim high :-)

ChrisL

Guys, there is only so far we can carry this metaphor, I fear. Eventually, even a pun-master the likes of Chris will run up against a Stone Wall…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dezom-meets-jackson_5183.jpg)

Now that is a [losing hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924/http:/www.spotsylvania.va.us/jacksonrun/index.cfm?doc_id=417) Dan :-P You don't know Jackson about pun masters ;-)

ChrisL

Is this a birthday thread? ;^)

Happy Birthday to you! May all of your birthday wishes be Grant-ed! :^P

I think I am a day [Early](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924/http:/blueandgraytrail.com/event/Jubal_Anderson_Early) now that I look at the calandar Tiff. [Mr Hutchinson's](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Grant%20Hutchinson) celebration actually starts tomorrow :-)

ChrisL

No worries. Better early than late :^) This gives the late people a chance to be on time. ;^)

_Sheesh, I used the pun that you had in the title. :^!_

\>No worries. Better early than late

How are we gonna work Jubal Early into this?

Dan, I already did that! Look above at my post "I think I am a day Early..." and follow the link :-)

ChrisL

PS: and check my other "offhand" comment (link) in my post before that one too :-)
Best Wishes, Grant!
Happy birthday, Grant!

Happy Birthday --

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Grant_Hutch_4565.png)
Happy birthday, Grant!

Birthday Wishes Grant!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/702907316845256234250_5426.jpg)

Happy Birthday

Tim
Hey Grant, best of birthdays! Congratulations on your new fine age. ;^)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/grant_6280.jpg)
  
Happy bday dear friend!  
Do those people knows that you have All Stars shoes and looks like a teenager? :P
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619233924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/grant_5636.gif)

Oops. sorry all for smashing such big pics in your faces.

Best  
/Stefan H

I am utterly agog, in an appreciative way of course.

Thanks, everyone.

(Even for the puns. Especially for the puns.)
Grant, don't tempt them -- not the puns, really... :^P

Yves, Groundhogs Day is over and Punnsatonney Phil has gone back in his hole :-P

ChrisL

\> _I am utterly agog..._

A **GOG**?
